statements: SELECT * FROM risk_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT id, metric_name, timestamp FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%risk%';
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM risk_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY metric_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50 AND timestamp < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT metric_name, timestamp FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY metric_name ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE timestamp < '2022-06-15' AND metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, measurement_date FROM risk_metrics;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM risk_metrics WHERE measurement_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_type, trend_description, analysis_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Revenue' ORDER BY metric_value DESC, measurement_date ASC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, measurement_date FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, measurement_date FROM risk_metrics JOIN trend_analysis ON risk_metrics.id = trend_analysis.metric_id WHERE trend_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY risk_metrics.id ASC;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM risk_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-08-31' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC, trend_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT id, metric_name FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM RiskMetrics;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetricsHistory ORDER BY history_id DESC;
SELECT metric_id, old_value, new_value, change_reason FROM RiskMetricsHistory WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM RiskMetrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM RiskMetrics GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetricsHistory JOIN RiskMetrics ON RiskMetricsHistory.metric_id = RiskMetrics.id ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetricsTrends WHERE trend_value > 100 ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY metric_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM metric_categories WHERE metric_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, measurement_date FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT trend_date, trend_value FROM trend_analysis WHERE metric_id = 3 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM risk_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;

SELECT rm.metric_name, rc.category_name, ta.trend_date, ta.trend_value FROM risk_metrics rm JOIN metric_categories mc ON rm.id = mc.metric_id JOIN risk_categories rc ON mc.category_id = rc.category_id JOIN trend_analysis ta ON rm.id = ta.metric_id WHERE ta.trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ta.trend_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT rm.id, rm.metric_name, rc.category_name FROM risk_metrics rm JOIN metric_categories mc ON rm.id = mc.metric_id JOIN risk_categories rc ON mc.category_id = rc.category_id WHERE rc.category_name = 'Financial' ORDER BY rm.metric_name ASC, rc.category_name;
SELECT rm.metric_name, COUNT(ta.id) AS trend_count FROM risk_metrics rm LEFT JOIN trend_analysis ta ON rm.id = ta.metric_id GROUP BY rm.id HAVING COUNT(ta.id) > 3 ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM RiskMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM MetricTrends ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT risk_factor_name, description FROM RiskFactors WHERE weight >= 0.6;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY risk_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Market Risk' AND date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM RiskMetrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT id, risk_factor_name, description FROM RiskFactors WHERE weight >= 0.5 AND risk_factor_name LIKE '%Credit%';
SELECT assessment_name, risk_score FROM RiskAssessment WHERE assessed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY risk_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RiskHistory WHERE action = 'Update' AND timestamp < NOW() ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
